static NAMESPACE_OSGEO_FDO::IConnectionManager* FeatureAccessManager::GetConnectionManager (   )  [static]
 

Static method that gets an object that implements IConnection Manager.

Returns:
Returns a static instance of an IConnectionManager object. Throws an instance of FdoException * if an error occurs.
